description: FOR THE WOMAN WHO IS YOUNGER THAN SHE LOOKSAs you age, your skin's natural defenses break down, and production of vital nutrients diminish. Combined with damage from free radicals due to air pollution, cigarette smoke, diet and exposure to UV light, your skin loses its elasticity and vibrancy.The most essential nutrient for healthy skin is Vitamin C. Its main function is the production of collagen, which gives your skin its elasticity. It's a powerful antioxidant that protects against sun damage and reverses age-related damage to the skin. As your Vitamin C production slows down, wrinkles and age spots begin to form.Not all Vitamin C Serums are the same. Pure Vitamin C is very unstable and sensitive to oxidation.Our new jb ESSENTIALS Vitamin C Serum is based on the latest research, containing Ethyl Ascorbic Acid which is the most stable and longest lasting Vitamin C on the market. Our Vitamin C formula with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E, produced with only the highest quality ingredients, revitalizes your skin, bringing back elasticity and radiance, and taking years off your appearance.Dermatologists agree that vitamin C is one of the most important products in anti-aging treatments for the skin. Dr. Oz has credited it with taking 10 years off your appearance. And the countless numbers of satisfied customers continues to grow.With your purchase you will get the following bonus:JB Essentials Guide To Skin Care(57 Page ebook Guide)** Lifetime Money Back Guarantee** Don't be surprised if this product is out of stock. It's in very high demand, so order today.Click The Orange Button Above To Order.
